title: “Sweetness and Spice” - Family Dynamics in D&D
itunes:title: “Sweetness and Spice” - Family Dynamics in D&D
description:
Unati and Jeremy are getting sweet and just a little bit spicy in today's episode as Two Wholesome Halflings discuss family in Dungeons and Dragons, how family can influence story in your games, how to make families and familial relationships work mechanically, as well as sharing some Tales From The Table and some more personal insights into how family has influenced our backstories. 

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including Campfire Chats where we dive into each episode of Outlaws & Obelisks.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
